item.title: Ismember = Donor on my server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

So I want to use ismember as donor on my server. No I am not changing it to donor. I am just simply using it and having it write out to server as a donor.
This might sound confusing but I just need to get it to work.
How do I make a command that you need ismember to work?
My save can use ismember 0-21 but it won’t let me use it
I’m sorry if this is comfusing but can someone please help with this
Oh and I wanted to make a log in title as well. something along the lines of:

else if (ismember == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Super Donor"+ playerName + " has logged in! There is now " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players."; }

Read full topic
